detectors.description:
APROracle.getLendDyDxAPR(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APROracle.sol#78-86) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-apr = (((aprBorrow * usage) / DECIMAL) * DyDx(DYDX).getEarningsRate().value) / DECIMAL (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APROracle.sol#84)
